body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture        Dancers With Ipu Heke NPS Photo                         Mele Oli Komo Haku ‘ia e Kepā Maly - Composed by KepāEia mākou i mua kou alo, - Here we are before you,Nā hoa ‘āina, ‘imi i ka pono. - Friends of the land, seeking good.E a‘o mai mākou i ka hana, - Teach us what is to be done,E ola i ka ‘āina ‘o Kīlauea. - That the land of Kīlauea will have life.from BioBlitz 2015  Duration:29 seconds                People Archeological Sites Cultural Landscapes Collections
title: Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park: History & Culture
